document.full_text: more than 80 percent of the companies that advertise on twitter renew their marketing efforts on the microblogging service, the company's chief executive said on wednesday.
document.title: twitter ceo says 80 percent of advertisers renew
lines_and_colors: more than 80 percent of the companies that advertise on twitter renew their marketing efforts on the microblogging service, the company's chief executive said on wednesday.
